rows.label: qev087503_MSG0001
rows.name:
About the beam-cannon projectâ€”
is there any way we can push the output up another 800 G's?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0002
rows.name: I know it's a lot...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0003
rows.name:
But if we can manage it,
I think we could punch through Ganglion armor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0004
rows.name: You want another 800 gigawatts' continuous output?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0005
rows.name: Yep![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0006
rows.name: Well, theoretically...sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0007
rows.name: Buuuut, what? There's some kind of practical hurdle?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0008
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0009
rows.name:
More output requires plasma maintained
at higher degrees of excitation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0010
rows.name: That, in turn, requires a more efficient magnetic trap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0011
rows.name: Ah, right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'd love to see it happen,
but Earth's technology just isn't there yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev087503_SEL0011
rows.name: Console Lin on the end of her good idea.

rows.label: qev087503_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev087503_SEL0021
rows.name: Point out that you are no longer ON Earth.

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0013
rows.name: Thanks...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0014
rows.name:
Back up a minute.
Why give up just because Earth didn't have the technology?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0015
rows.name: Remember where we are now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0016
rows.name: That's a fair point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0017
rows.name: It's true that Earth may not have possessed this technology...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0018
rows.name: but Mira could be a different story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0019
rows.name: I don't follow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0020
rows.name:
Oh, I get it! She means xeno tech!
We've got all kinds of races here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0021
rows.name: One of them might have a solution![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0022
rows.name: Oh. Yeah, that...makes sense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0023
rows.name: What is that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0024
rows.name: One of the Ganglion's Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0025
rows.name:
We confirmed that this model is outfitted
with a high-output beam cannon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0026
rows.name:
And it's almost a certainty that
their capacitors are better than ours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0027
rows.name: So if we can analyze them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0028
rows.name:
Right. We might be able to find a solution
to our magnetic-trap problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0029
rows.name:
Come on, guys.
We've got a giant laser to hunt down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0030
rows.name: Qmoevan capacitors are hi-spec Ganglion items.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0031
rows.name:
You should be able to get them from Qmoevas
in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0032
rows.name:
Hmm, let's see. Could I ask you to go collect three of
those Qmoevan capacitors now for analysis?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0033
rows.name:
We're talking about an extra 800 gigawatts here.
Just solving the magnetic-trap issue isn't going to get
you the giant beam weapon you want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0034
rows.name:
I recommend you talk to Brenna about the other issues.
She's another engineer here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0035
rows.name:
She's stubborn as a rock, but incredibly competent.
I'm sure her insights will be of use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0036
rows.name:
Best of luck to you! What you're trying takes guts,
and I'm behind you one hundred percent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0037
rows.name:
So Brenna's on board with your new weapon-
development project?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0038
rows.name:
Ha! It would take somebody as passionate as Lin to
get that stubborn girl to help. I'm impressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0039
rows.name:
Now why don't you go show Commander Vandham
what that passion has wrought?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0040
rows.name: Did you need me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0041
rows.name:
I thought Brenna said she had you off gathering
something for her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087503_MSG0042
rows.name:
I'll be here. Why don't you take care of that first,
then come back and see me?[ST:wait ]
